subject: svn commit: samba r22690 - in tags/LDB_0_9_0: .
body:
Author: jelmer
Date: 2007-05-05 20:51:58 +0000 (Sat, 05 May 2007)
New Revision: 22690

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=22690

Log:
Use DESTDIR in more places.
Modified:
   tags/LDB_0_9_0/Makefile.in


Changeset:
Modified: tags/LDB_0_9_0/Makefile.in
===================================================================
--- tags/LDB_0_9_0/Makefile.in	2007-05-05 20:44:16 UTC (rev 22689)
+++ tags/LDB_0_9_0/Makefile.in	2007-05-05 20:51:58 UTC (rev 22690)
@@ -163,7 +163,7 @@
 installcheck: install test
 
 install: all
-	mkdir -p $(includedir) $(libdir)/pkgconfig $(libdir) $(DESTDIR)$(bindir)
+	mkdir -p $(DESTDIR)$(includedir) $(DESTDIR)$(libdir)/pkgconfig $(libdir) $(DESTDIR)$(bindir)
 	cp $(srcdir)/include/ldb.h $(srcdir)/include/ldb_errors.h $(DESTDIR)$(includedir)
 	cp $(LDB_LIB) $(DESTDIR)$(libdir)
 	cp $(BINS) $(DESTDIR)$(bindir)
